statements: SELECT * FROM projects WHERE progress > 50;
SELECT project_name, materials_used FROM projects WHERE project_id = 3;
SELECT project_name, printing_time FROM projects WHERE project_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT project_name, progress, printing_time FROM projects WHERE printing_time > NOW();
SELECT * FROM projects WHERE materials_used IS NOT NULL ORDER BY project_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM projects WHERE project_id = 1;
SELECT project_name, progress FROM projects WHERE progress > 50 ORDER BY project_name DESC;
SELECT project_id, project_name, materials_used FROM projects WHERE materials_used IS NOT NULL AND printing_time < '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT project_name, progress, materials_used FROM projects WHERE progress IN (25, 50, 75) ORDER BY progress ASC, project_name;
SELECT project_id, project_name, printing_time FROM projects WHERE project_name ILIKE '%project%' AND progress > 0;
SELECT * FROM projects ORDER BY project_name DESC;
SELECT project_id, project_name, progress FROM projects WHERE progress > 50;
SELECT project_name, materials_used, printing_time_hours FROM projects WHERE materials_used IS NOT NULL;
SELECT project_id, project_name, cost_per_unit FROM projects p INNER JOIN materials m ON p.project_id = m.material_id;
SELECT project_name, progress, materials_used, printing_time_hours FROM projects WHERE project_id = 3;
SELECT project_name, progress FROM projects WHERE progress > 50 ORDER BY project_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM materials WHERE material_type = 'metal' AND cost_per_unit > 10.00;
SELECT project_name, printing_time_hours FROM projects WHERE materials_used LIKE '%ink%' AND printing_time_hours > 5;
SELECT project_name, materials.material_name, cost_per_unit FROM projects JOIN materials ON projects.materials_used = materials.material_name;
SELECT project_name, progress, materials.material_type FROM projects JOIN materials ON projects.materials_used = materials.material_name ORDER BY progress DESC, materials.material_type ASC;
SELECT * FROM projects;
SELECT project_name, project_status FROM projects WHERE project_status = 'InProgress';
SELECT project_name, project_start_date, project_end_date FROM projects ORDER BY project_start_date DESC;
SELECT material_name, material_quantity FROM materials_used WHERE material_quantity > 10;
SELECT printing_start, printing_end, printing_duration FROM printing_time WHERE project_id = 'd69193eb-7364-4a79-bcc6-3e3091381fa8';
SELECT * FROM projects ORDER BY project_start_date DESC;
SELECT project_name, project_description FROM projects WHERE project_status = 'Completed';
SELECT project_id, COUNT(material_id) AS num_materials FROM materials_used GROUP BY project_id ORDER BY num_materials DESC;
SELECT project_name, printing_duration FROM projects JOIN printing_time ON projects.project_id = printing_time.project_id WHERE printing_duration > INTERVAL '1 day';
SELECT project_name, material_name, material_quantity FROM projects JOIN materials_used ON projects.project_id = materials_used.project_id WHERE project_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM projects;
SELECT project_name, project_status FROM projects WHERE project_start_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY project_finish_date DESC;
SELECT project_id, project_description FROM projects WHERE project_status = 'In Progress';
SELECT material_name, material_quantity FROM materials WHERE material_type = 'Plastic' AND material_color = 'Blue';
SELECT * FROM print_logs WHERE printing_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY printing_time DESC;
SELECT project_id, project_name, project_status FROM projects WHERE project_start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT project_name, project_start_date, project_finish_date FROM projects WHERE project_status = 'In Progress' ORDER BY project_start_date DESC;
SELECT project_id, project_name, project_description, project_status FROM projects WHERE project_finish_date < '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM materials WHERE material_quantity > 100 ORDER BY material_name ASC;
SELECT log_id, project_id, printing_date, printing_time, material_used FROM print_logs WHERE printing_date BETWEEN '2022-07-01' AND '2022-08-01';
SELECT project_id, project_name, project_description FROM projects;
SELECT material_name, material_type FROM materials WHERE material_color = 'Red';
SELECT printer_id, printer_name, printer_brand, printer_model FROM printers ORDER BY printer_brand DESC;
SELECT * FROM prints WHERE print_progress > 50;

SELECT project_name, material_name, printer_name FROM projects p JOIN prints pt ON p.project_id = pt.project_id JOIN materials m ON m.material_id = pt.material_id JOIN printers pr ON pr.printer_id = pt.printer_id;
SELECT * FROM projects WHERE project_status = 'In Progress';
SELECT project_name, project_description FROM projects WHERE project_id = 1;
SELECT material_name, material_color FROM materials WHERE material_type = 'PLA' ORDER BY material_name ASC;
SELECT printer_name, printer_brand, printer_model FROM printers WHERE printer_brand LIKE '%son%';

SELECT p.project_name, m.material_name, pr.printer_name FROM projects p JOIN prints pr ON p.project_id = pr.project_id JOIN materials m ON pr.material_id = m.material_id WHERE pr.print_progress > 50 ORDER BY pr.print_time DESC;
